sense.def:
Kadar dva človeka prvič
meet
, se po naključju znajdeta na istem kraju in se spoznata.

seg.quote: I met a Swedish girl on the train.
They met each other at a party in London.
Come and meet Tony and Rick.

sense.def:
To meet
pomeni, da se dva človeka dogovorita, da bosta ob istem času prišla na isti kraj.

Kadar človek
meets someone who is travelling
ali kadar človek
meets someone's train, plane, or bus
, gre na postajo ali letališče in tam počaka, da vlak, letalo ali avtobus pripelje določenega človeka.

Kadar več ljudi
meet
, se zberejo zaradi določenega namena.

seg.quote: Teachers in Tokyo met to discuss our methods.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
meets a need, requirement, or condition
, je zadovoljivo ali dovolj veliko, da zadosti neki potrebi, zahtevi ali pogoju.

seg.quote: His income is inadequate to meet his basic needs.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
meets a problem or challenge
, uspešno reši težavo ali prestane izziv.

Kadar človek
meets the cost of something
, zagotovi sredstva za določene stroške.

To meet a situation or attitude
pomeni doživeti določene razmere ali odnos.

seg.quote: Where had I met this kind of ignorance before?

sense.def:
Kadar en predmet
meets another object
, zadene ali udari ob drugega.

seg.quote: The heavy club met his head with a crack.

sense.def:
Kadar oči enega človeka
meet someone else's
, oba hkrati pogledata drug proti drugemu.

seg.quote: Their eyes meet, and they smile.

sense.def:
Tam, kjer dve površini ali črti
meet
, sta druga ob drugi ali pa se združita.

seg.quote: ...where this road meets the one from Lairg.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
meets up with someone
, oba gresta ob istem času na isti kraj.

seg.quote: We planned to meet up with them in Florence.
We can meet with the professor Monday night.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
meets with a particular reaction
ali
is met with a particular reaction
, se ljudje na to odzovejo na določen način.

seg.quote: All appeals for aid meet with refusal.
His approaches had been met with ill-concealed disdain.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
meets with success or failure
, je uspešen ali neuspešen.
